name: Grail Project
overview:
You scour the Internet every day to ﬁnd interesting content.

We believe it should ﬁnd you

What if what you loved found you? The way we the people of the world find the articles and entertainment we love is broken. The Grail Project is a collective effort to redefine the the way this works. Our goal is to transform this experience of media consumption into something magical, social, personal, intuitive; the holy grail of content at your fingertips.

Founded by Ryan Magnussen, CEO, he conceived The Grail Project in early 2010 and assembled a handpicked group of industry veterans to bring the vision to life. His team is a creative and technical group of doers with unparalleled industry experience. They are passionate about redefining the world of media and transforming it into something relevant and magical.

What’s next? We believe in a collaborative approach to solving problems. The Grail Project is currently partnering with the top innovative minds and companies to build products that address the needs of both consumers and content creators. Stay tuned for more developments!

milestones.description: Alpha Product ready for lean startup testing!
